title: Samsung Black 2.1 Channel Soundbar Audio System HW-J355/ZA - Overview
description:
Samsung Black 2.1 Channel Soundbar Audio System - http://www.abt.com/product/89028/Samsung-HWJ355ZA.html

Specifications
Connectivity
• Aux Input: Yes
• Auto Power Link: Yes
• TV SoundConnect: Yes
• Bluetooth: Yes
• USB: Yes
• Optical Inputs: Yes
• Bluetooth Power On: Yes
Audio Features
• Number of Sound Modes (DSP): 4 (Music Clear Voice Sports Movie)
• Bluetooth HiFi Codec: Yes
• Amplifier: Digital Amp
Audio Processing
• DTS: DTS 2 Ch
• Dolby Digital: Dolby Digital 2 channel
Speakers
• Subwoofer: Wired Passive
• Speaker: Closed Enclosure
General
• Color: Black
• Frequency Response (amp): 20Hz20KHz
• Total Power (W): 120 W
• Number of Channels: 2.1
Features
• Samsung Audio Remote App: Yes
• 3D Sound Plus: Yes
• Crystal Amp: Pro
